heading: Sunday Night
text: Scattered snow showers with squalls possible mainly north and west. Lows in the teens, close to 20 in the broad valleys west and south. Gusty. West to northwest wind at 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph with the strongest winds in the eastern ADK.

heading: Monday
text: Early morning flurries northeast, then brief sunshine before more clouds arrive around noon. On and off snow showers during the later half of the day mostly north and west. Highs in the upper 20s and low 30s.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly cloudy, with some clearing developing in the southern valleys. Chance of a light snow shower in the north. Lows from the teens to near 20 in the northeast, in the low to mid 20s elsewhere.
